Smart Shower Head: A shower head that uses AI technology to provide personalized shower experiences. The shower head would use facial recognition to identify the user and remember their preferred shower settings.
Shower Head with built-in speakers: A shower head with built-in speakers that allow users to listen to music or podcasts while they shower.
Shower Head with LED lights: A shower head with LED lights that can be programmed to change colors or patterns to create a relaxing shower experience.
Shower Head with a built-in humidifier: A shower head with a built-in humidifier that adds moisture to the air and helps to prevent dry skin.
Shower Head with a built-in air purifier: A shower head with a built-in air purifier that removes impurities from the water and air, creating a healthier shower experience.
